name: Nike Dunk SB Supreme "Decade of Supremacy" Custom
description:
Nike Dunk SB "Decade of Supremacy"

Its been 10 yrs since the dope collaboration between Nike and the world famous skate brand "Supreme" collabo'd to bring you one of the most epic and still by far one of the most sought out SB's ever released. I created this pair in commemoration of that release. The shoe features a Croc Print Upper Pine Green/ White/ Gold. All Designs hand drawn and done by myself. For nostalgic reasons I added the Clientele Lace Locks. 

*To Order w/ Lace Locks simply to store click on shoe and then add lace lock to cart.

*To select specified size simply return to store and click on item and add shoe size.

*For size Option If not below please email mrmotocustoms@gmail.com for special size request.

name: MOTO FIXES
description:
Properly label your shoes for shipping and handling purposes.

 

Moto Restoration 1                                                        MOTOFIX1-001
- Basic Clean
- Sole De-yellowing (This does not include Jordan Brand or Nike clear soles)
- Clean or Replacement Set of  laces.
- Original (or as close as possible) color touch up.

$35.00 plus $14 shipping & handling

 

 

MOTO Restoration 2                                                       MOTOFIX2-002

- Basic CLEAN
- Suede or Nubuck touch up ( no repair of missing materials)
- Sneaker prep/ restoration of chipping /cracking paint
- Clean or Replacement Set of laces.
- Original (or as close as possible) color touch up.

$45.00 plus $14 shipping & handling

 

 

MOTO Restoration 3                                                        MOTOFIX3-003

- Basic CLEAN
- Sole De-yellowing include Jordan Brand sole & Nike OG/Retro Clear Soles
- Sneaker prep/ restoration of chipping /cracking paint.
- CLEAN OR REPLACEMENT SET OF LACES.
- Original (or as close as possible) color touch up.

$55.00 plus $14 shipping & handling

 

Moto Restoration 4 - Optimal for Jordans and Nikes     Motofix4-004

- Basic Clean
- Sole De-yellowing include Jordan Brand sole & Nike OG/Retro
- Clean or Replacement set of  laces.
- Mid Sole cracking repair.
- Mid Sole complete color removal or change ( no signs of cracks)
- Use of shoegoo if needed.
- Sneaker prep
- Color Match Including suede dye
- Toe Box crease removal

$75.00 plus $14 shipping &  handling

name: MOTO's CUSTOMS
description:
PRICES BELOW ARE BASED ON CUSTOMER PROVIDING
The SNEAKERS - I won't be providing the SNEAKERS (customer Provides sneakers). To place a custom choose from options below, you can add as many prints as you'd like, just fill out a contact us message with specific details and choose which prints you'd like in the options below. E-mail  mrmotocustoms@gmail.com with specified custom package choice and specified color choices as well As special additions if apply. Custom Jobs take between 15- 30 days.

 *For each additional color add to the cart before checking out, please and thank you!

*For multiple prints also add them to the cart before checking out, please indicate placement in email.


FOR BASIC or Special/ Collector COLOR CUSTOMIZATION:

 

MotoCUS 1 (New Kicks)                              MOTONKCUS1- 001

 

- Sneaker Prep

- Set of Replacement Laces or Matching Laces upon request.

- Basic Color Switch (one Color no designs)

 

$60/ $65 (Special or Collector Color) 

plus $14 Return Shipping and handling

 

MotoCUS 2 (New Kicks)                             MotoNKCUS2- 002

 

- Sneaker Prep

- Set of Replacement laces or Matching laces upon request.

- Basic Color Switch (two color no designs)

 

$70/ $75 (Special or Collector Color)

* $10 for every Additional Color

Plus $14 Return Shipping and handling

 

 

Special Additions:

 

Choose which custom choice you want and add on Cement, Croc, Safari, Giraffe, Cheetah/ leopard, Duck Camo, Stars or Speckle print.

 

Prints Engraved ($10 Section/ $25 Whole Sneaker)

Prints Drawn ($5 Section/ $15 Whole Sneaker)

Stars ($5 section / $10 Whole Sneaker)

Speckle Print ($5 section/ $10 Whole Sneaker)

 

- Cement Print                             CMPCUS- CMP001

- Croc Print                                 CRPCUS-  CRP001

- Safari Print                                SAPCUS- SAP001

- Giraffe Print                              GRPCUS- GRP001

- Cheetah/ Leopard Print              CLPCUS-  CLP001

- Duck Camo Print                         DCPCUS- DCP001

- Stars                                          STPCUS- STP001

- Speckle Print                               SPPCUS- SPP001

name: "OUT THE BOX"
description:
THIS PRICE INCLUDES THE CUSTOMER SENDING IN A BASE SHOE.

In this package a customers has the option with their provided base shoe (Deadstock or Slightly worn) and receive the Mr. Moto's Custom "Out The Box" 1 of 1 treatment,  when placing an order you can detail a specific theme or color way  you'd like and provide any additional requests you'd like done on your shoe for example; sports teams, superheroes, evil villians, tv shows, or movies are just some ideas for themes.

If you request a few pairs for this "Out The Box" option, Mr. MoTo Customs will work out a discount with you.

- "Out The Box" Custom                    OTBCUS- OTB001

$275 Plus $14 Return Shipping & Handling
